label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_020
content:
## 2026-01-22 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS req | p50: 540ms p95: 1260ms p99: N/A | err: 0.6% (2 errors) | success: 99.4%
- /dns-query: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A
- /ttl-change: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

- /change-request: REQUESTS req | p50: N/A p95: N/A p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 29% | Mem 62% | Disk 78% | Conns: N/A | Net: 80/112 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 23% | Mem 50% | Disk 58% | Conns: N/A | Net: 62/80 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 49% | Mem 68% | Disk 54% | Conns: N/A | Net: 102/142 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 33% | Mem 73% | Disk 64% | Conns: N/A | Net: 16/21 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-ixfr: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-propagation: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A
- pool-signing: active N/A | idle N/A | waiting N/A | exhaustion N/A | max N/A | avg_wait N/A

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.8% | Bandwidth: N/A | Origin requests: N/A

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNS zone transfer success rate on hostname: 99.4%
- [INFO] DNS zone transfer requests: 34
- [INFO] IXFR requests: 220
- [WARNING] DNS query NX domain percentage: 2.0%

- [INFO] DNS queries per second: avg 23200 | peak 57000

- [INFO] Changes failed: 0
- [INFO] Mean time to apply changes: 17 min
- [INFO] Resolver cache hit rate: 88.8%
- [WARNING] Negative cache hit rate: 38.8%
- [INFO] Prefetch enabled: 80%
- [INFO] Auth response avg latency: 17.3ms
- [P95] Auth response latency: 41.8ms
- [INFO] EDNS0 present: 75%

- [COMPLIANCE] Audit log gaps: 0
- [TRANSFER] AXFR requests: 34 | success: 99.4% | avg ms: 540 | p95 ms: 1260 | tsig failures: 0
- [TRANSFER] IXFR requests: 220 | success: 99.3%
- [TTL] Records changed: 39 | zones touched: 6 | min: 300s | max: 43200s | median: 3600s | rollbacks: 0
- [PROPAGATION] Sites: 36 | avg latency: 64s | p95 latency: 152s | stale answer %: 0.3%
- [DNSSEC] Zones signed: 80 | signing queue depth: 1 | signature refreshes: 120 | ds mismatch: 0 | bogus validation events: 1

### Events
- Moved remaining planned migrations to off-peak window; completed dry-run validation scripts against production data without applying changes.
- Normalized TTLs back to 300+ for zones that had temporary 120s; confirmed propagation and cache hit stability.
- Closed lame delegation follow-up actions; registrar confirmations recorded in audit notes.
- Updated SLO doc: propagation p95 target 180s for standard changes; added escalation steps for sustained stale answers above 1%.

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: R. Ivanov. 1 pages. 4 tickets. Status: Normal; process improvements applied after prior peak-window issues.
